snippet.title: Hexia - Early access Steam trailer
snippet.description:
Hexia is a real-time strategy and management game, where your task, as the King of the Realm you have been assigned, is to create and expand the territory, build new infrastructures and command and lead your people.

▶️ STEAM PAGE: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1173730/Hexia
▶️ WEBSITE: https://www.blackmastiffstudio.com/hexia
▶️  PUBLISHER: https://www.demios.it
▶️ DEVELOPER: https://www.blackmastiffstudio.com
